characters: Driver of a white sedan, pedestrians, other vehicles
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. There are multiple vehicles ahead, including a white sedan. Pedestrians and other vehicles are present on both sides of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed, keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is navigating through an urban area with moderate traffic.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left side: A red tricycle, approximately 15 meters away, moving slowly. 3) Right side: A black car, approximately 5 meters away, parked.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, pedestrian
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is ahead, maintaining a steady speed. A pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side, moving quickly towards the center of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while following the white sedan ahead. The sudden appearance of the pedestrian from the left side may require the vehicle to decelerate or stop to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left side: A pedestrian, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly moving towards the center of the road.
